skill_development_plan: Study Product Management fundamentals: lifecycle, prioritization frameworks (e.g., RICE, MoSCoW), roadmapping.
Understand market research techniques and competitive analysis.
Learn user research methods (interviews, surveys, usability testing).
Gain familiarity with UX/UI design principles and user-centered design.
project_ideas: Define a 'User Control Interface' for Warehouse Drone

Treat the drone user (e.g., warehouse manager) as a customer. Conduct user research (even simulated), define user needs, create mockups/wireframes for a control interface, write user stories, and prioritize features for a minimum viable product (MVP). Focus on usability and user goals.

estimated_timeline.total_estimated_time: 6-12 months depending on prior experience and time commitment
